name: Godolunky
description:
GODOLUNKY
A clone of Spelunky made to learn Godot and practice c++ w/GDNative. All the code is original, most of the art and sounds are from Spelunky Classic by Derek Yu. Source available at https://github.com/cmacmillan/Godotlunky

Sorry for the lack of a WebGL version. GDNative requires support for Shared Array Buffers, which requires the server to send certain headers which itch does not send. You can still download the standalone windows executable below.
